channel.title: NEW QUESTION: Regarding xBox 360 Transfer Kit (xChange 360)
channel.description:
[s]Ok, as you all know a few internet plans have a thing called off-peak, where you download in a timespace and it doesn't cut into your data usage. Unfortunately, my plan has offpeak hours of 3am -> 9am. Not much time, but enough to download a few episodes of shows etc. I was just wondering, is there anyway for me to set something up, which will start a torrent downloading at 3am, and end it at 9am?
I know I'll have to end up writing a Java application to do it for me, but I really cannot be fucked to do so. [/s] ^ SOLVED.
[hr] I have a transfer cord for the 360 (as below) [img]http://xbox360media.ign.com/xbox360/image/article/783/783873/xbox-360-hard-drive-transfer-20070426021943688-000.jpg[/img] and when you buy the kit, it comes with a CD. I have lost my cd, as I had this kit when I first got my 120GB HDD. I just need the software, but cannot find a download. I believe the software is actually called xChange 360.
EDIT: I just rang xbox, and they say you cannot download. But surely someone has made a copy of the image.

item.title: NEW QUESTION: Regarding xBox 360 Transfer Kit (xChange 360)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Ah, I’ll check it out. I usually use Vuze, so I’ll have a look.

EDIT: Nevermind, got it. Just a little fiddling around in µTorrent. Thanks lawl.

Read full topic
item.source: NEW QUESTION: Regarding xBox 360 Transfer Kit (xChange 360)
